CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( WXIntegration__Wealth_X_Dossier_Id__c ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/WXIntegration__WXSalesforceAssociate?firstName="+ FirstName +"&lastName="+ LastName + "&companyName=" + Company + "&sfRecordId=" + Id , IMAGE("/resource/WXIntegration__wx_resources/images/wx-associate.png", "Associate",25,25),"_self") , HYPERLINK("/apex/WXIntegration__WXDissociate?sfRecordId="+Id , IMAGE("/resource/WXIntegration__wx_resources/images/wx-dissociate.png", "Dissociate",25,25),"_self"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will auto populate based on Wealth-X Data integration.
CustomField.label: Wealth-X Actions
